sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect , useState} from 'react'; import './css/met.css'; import numeral from "numeral"; function Main() { const[worldInfo , setWorldInfo] = useState({}); const[countries , setCountries] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setWorldInfo(data); }); },[]); useEffect( () => { const getCountries = async () => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/countries') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { const countries = data.map((country) => ({ country : country.country, cases : country.cases, deaths : country.deaths, recovered : country.recovered, active : country.active, critical: country.critical, })); setCountries(countries); }); } getCountries(); },[]); return (

CoronaVirus Test

1.7 million people died in the world due to the Corona Virus

CoronaVirus is a dangerous threat to the elderly, children and families

Please do the CoronaVirus test to protect our world!

CoronaVirus Test
  • Countries
  • Recovered
  • Deaths
  • Cases
  • Active
  • Critical
    { countries.map((country , i) => (
  • {++i} {country.country}
    • {numeral(country.recovered).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.deaths).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.cases).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.active).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.critical).format('0,0')}
    • )) }

Countries

  • 1Afrika

  • 4Avropa
  • 5Asiya
  • 6Avstraliya

World

  • 2Deaths
    • {worldInfo.deaths}
  • 3Recovered
    • {worldInfo.recovered}
  • 4Active
    • {worldInfo.active}
  • 5Critical
    • {worldInfo.critical}
  • 6Tests
    • {worldInfo.tests}
); } export default Main;
